metadata.title: CVE-2017-5754 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - critical
metadata.description:
Systems with microprocessors utilizing speculative execution and indirectbranch prediction may allow unauthorized disclosure of information to anattacker with local user access via a side-channel analysis of the datacache.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-5754` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.13.0-25-generic - 4.13.0-25.29
linux-image-4.13.0-25-generic-lpae - 4.13.0-25.29
linux-image-4.13.0-25-lowlatency - 4.13.0-25.29
linux-image-extra-4.13.0-25-generic - 4.13.0-25.29
No subscription required

linux-image-4.15.0-1006-raspi2 - 4.15.0-1006.7
No subscription required

linux-image-4.15.0-1001-aws - 4.15.0-1001.1
No subscription required
